item.title: PurePK?
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

[quote=“strengthxlx, post:2, topic:188737”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“purepk”)) && (playerLevel[1] 2<=)
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
teleportToX = (Coords);
teleportToY = (Coords);
sendMessage(“You teleport to the pure pk area!”);
}
}[/quote] Also… put in the coords for where your pure pk is. not the (coords) lol

item.title: PurePK?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

didnt work, lemme try this hold onif (command.equalsIgnoreCase("purepk")) &&if (playerLevel[1] 2<=) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = (Coords); teleportToY = (Coords); sendMessage("You teleport to the pure pk area!"); } }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2008, 04:32:50 PM[/size][hr]client.java:10190: illegal start of expression if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("purepk")) &&if (playerLevel[1] 2<=) ^ client.java:10190: illegal start of expression if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("purepk")) &&if (playerLevel[1] 2<=) ^ client.java:10190: ')' expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("purepk")) &&if (playerLevel[1] 2<=) ^ client.java:10190: not a statement if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("purepk")) &&if (playerLevel[1] 2<=) ^ client.java:10190: illegal start of expression if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("purepk")) &&if (playerLevel[1] 2<=) ^ client.java:10190: ';' expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("purepk")) &&if (playerLevel[1] 2<=) ^ client.java:10202: 'else' without 'if' else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("smith")) ^ 7 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.description:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“purepk”)) && (playerLevel[1] 2<=)
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
teleportToX = (Coords);
teleportToY = (Coords);
sendMessage(“You teleport to the pure pk area!”);
